title: Personal Website
text: Just my own little slice of the www :-)

title: Domains Vault
text: This is a domain parking and reselling page I have been working on for my own personal use. Though anyone is free to use it should they like.

title: ADHD Dev Simple Chat
text: This project demonstrates how to create a simple chatbot using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Blank Page
text: Just a small, real-time collaborative text editor. I made this to learn more about websockets and real-time communication. It's a work in progress, but it's a fun little project.

title: TextGuard
text: A tiny spam detection demo built with TypeScript, React (Vite), and Express. No LLMs—just heuristics + a Naive Bayes classifier trained on a small labeled dataset.

title: GroundWorkJS framework
text: This private project serves as the foundation for building scalable, modular, and feature-rich applications designed to evolve into a fully extensible platform.

title: ServerScripts
text: This repository contains a collection of useful CLI-based scripts for monitoring live metrics and data on a server.

title: Binge Backup
text: Binge Backup is a lightweight Chrome Extension that lets you export your My List movies and shows from Netflix (or similar layouts) into a downloadable.

title: Walmart Cart Cleaner
text: This Chrome extension automates the process of removing all items from your Walmart shopping cart. It finds and clicks all "Remove" buttons in the cart at 1.3‑second intervals, simulating what a user would do manually.

title: ZipDrop
text: ZipDrop is a simple tool to create ZIP archives from selected folders, excluding specified patterns. Use the controls below to select a folder and manage exclusion patterns.

title: CommuteCalculator
text: A little tool I created to calculate my daily commute expenses.

title: StatusZen
text: A comprehensive list of HTTP status codes and their descriptions, organized for use in various programming languages
